title: Downloads & Resources
subtitle: Templates, checklists, and tools for accessible academic publishing
intro: Download ready-to-use templates, checklists, and color palettes to help you create accessible academic content.

latex.title: LaTeX Accessible Template
latex.description: Complete LaTeX article template with accessibility packages pre-configured. Includes proper document structure, accessible fonts, and PDF/UA tagging support.
latex.features: Features: Tagged PDF, hyperlinks, bookmarks, accessible tables

word.title: Microsoft Word Template
word.description: Word document template with built-in styles, heading hierarchy, and accessibility checker reminders.
word.features: Features: Style presets, alt text placeholders, accessible tables

css.title: CSS Stylesheet
css.description: Accessible CSS stylesheet with Okabe-Ito color variables, proper typography, and WCAG-compliant contrast ratios.
css.features: Features: Color variables, responsive design, dark mode support

wcag.title: WCAG 2.2 Compliance Checklist
wcag.description: Comprehensive checklist covering all WCAG 2.2 Level AA success criteria relevant to academic publishing.

pdf.title: PDF Accessibility Checklist
pdf.description: Step-by-step checklist for creating and validating PDF/UA compliant documents.

submission.title: Pre-Submission Checklist
submission.description: Quick checklist to verify accessibility before submitting to journals.

okabe.title: Okabe-Ito Palette Files
okabe.description: Colorblind-safe Okabe-Ito palette in multiple formats for different tools.

pac.title: PAC 2024 (PDF Accessibility Checker)
pac.description: Free tool for validating PDF/UA compliance

colorOracle.title: Color Oracle
colorOracle.description: Free colorblindness simulator for Windows, Mac, and Linux

wave.title: WAVE Web Accessibility Tool
wave.description: Browser extension for checking web accessibility

nvda.title: NVDA Screen Reader
nvda.description: Free screen reader for testing accessibility on Windows

contrast.title: Contrast Ratio Quick Reference
contrast.description: One-page guide to WCAG contrast requirements

altText.title: Alt Text Writing Guide
altText.description: Best practices and examples for writing effective alt text

tables.title: Accessible Tables Guide
tables.description: How to create accessible tables in LaTeX, Word, and HTML

python.title: Python Accessibility Scripts
python.description: Collection of Python scripts for automating accessibility checks and generating accessible plots.
python.contents: Contents: matplotlib setup, contrast checker, alt text generator

r.title: R Accessibility Package
r.description: R package with functions for creating accessible ggplot2 visualizations.
r.contents: Contents: ggplot2 themes, color scales, export functions
